title: Weekly TFT mission (level 6 by round 11)
body:
How do I get this mission completed?
 I've done many rounds getting to level 6 before round 11 and it has never counted.

replies.body: Does your mission panel have a little clock in the top right with pending games?
No, it doesn't. Everything else is fine, it's just that one mission. I've even tried selling everything but a 1 gold character to get it even sooner and it hasn't worked.

Hmmm, wait a day and relog, and if it still hasn't redeemed, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I've just got that mission now so I'll see if mine struggles too. It's possible the mission itself is bugged.

EDIT: I haven't been able to complete it either, so either we're both unlucky sods or the mission is bugged.
How do i remove that mission its triggering me
Unless EUW has different mission cycles it should have disappeared when the week reset. If they do then, whenever your week resets.

EDIT: THE MISSION SEEMS TO BE FIXED, MINE JUST UNLOCKED.

Still bugged.. Also impossible to get 6 before 2nd carousel, including primary carousel, doesn't matter what you do, you can't get the 18 exp needed for 6, that early. Anyway, hope it's fixed soon! Having a ton of fun with this mode, excited for ranked!
Same, problem guys i just need this mission, im tryed all the ways, but simply, don't work xd

Reporting and can confirm this is bugged. It seems to count the preliminary carousel, despite stating you should reach it by round 11 (which I have done and more so); but reaching this mission way before the intended goal (first carousel after preliminary) is WAY overblown? Will this retroactively fixed for those players that get stuck with a mission, or do we at least get a reroll function?
Bugged for me, too. I sold everything a few rounds before and bought all exp. Did what was asked and never levelled up.

My guess is that the way the mission is programmed it's before the FIRST shared draft, me and a friend deliberately tried to complete this quest, and got to level 6 the round after the first carousel with 3 gold left and 3 gold on the board, so it's just impossible outside of early pirates and getting really lucky on a gold drop.

That was my guess too, but it's obviously not working as intended. Given that GP is blue getting the 3 pirates that early is extremely unlikely so we can't even confirm such a method as a workaround.

Hopefully they get it sorted soon.
I feel I'm having the same trouble, do you have to complete round 6 for it to complete?
I have exact same problem. All other missions are fine.
yeah I have the same mission and haven't been able to complete it

I was able to finish it. Here is what I did. 1st pick grab a 2g champion, and sell it at start of the 1st round. Don't buy anything after this! Then as soon as you get back from picking from the 2nd carousel spam your level up button. Should hit level 6 and finish the mission.
I was able to finish it by selling all the stuff by the first carousel and then getting lvl 6 by the first fight afterwards.
